name: spiffily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a stylish, attractive, or pleasing way: Bright red and black carriages were pulled behind spiffily smart horses. They arrived as a group, each one of them spiffily dressed.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was spiffily attired in a black suit and a white shirt with a turned-up collar.Their synchronized hip-hop dance routines are spiffily choreographed.At every tourist hotspot, coach parties trailed after their spiffily dressed guides.I decided to call back about an office space for rent in an old, but spiffily renovated factory building.
